trans-unit.source: Implements a read-only base interface for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection"></xref> class.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection> interfaces implement the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface; so all properties and methods of that interface are implied here.
You can use this type of interface for read-only field collections.

For example, the application can retrieve the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A> property, which is a combined collection of explicitly defined and automatically generated fields for the control.
However, the application cannot add or remove fields in this collection.
Returns an array of all the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListField"></xref> collection.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An array of all the items in the collection.
Returns the index of a field.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
In the second version of this method, it searches for a field with the `Title` property `fieldId` and returns the first matching field.
If no match is found, it searches for a field with the `DataField` property's `fieldID` parameter and returns the first matching field.
Otherwise, it returns `-1`.
A string to compare with the `Title` or `DataField` property.
The index of the specified field.
Returns the index of a field.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
In the first version of this method, it returns the index of the specified field.
If the specified field is not in the collection, it returns `-1`.
A field to search for in the specified collection.
The index of the specified field.
Returns an item in the collection, by index.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The index of the item to retrieve from the collection.
The item in the collection at the specified index.
